name: heading home ((lis)anne)
description:
Bike home from a long day of work in the rain, while catching up with a friend.

This "game" has no real gameplay; you do not directly control penelope. Most of the interaction comes in the form of (branching) chat conversations with your friend.

It's is mostly about the autumn vibes, so most of the work went into making a wet-yet-cozy atmosphere :]
